A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Unsatisfying. It looks great\, most of the humor works well enough and the score is on point but the story is the worst I've seen in a Star Wars movie. Most of the questions you have after 'the Force Awakens' are answered\, but in the most disappointing way possible. The plot feels lazy and has holes as big as the death star. I wouldn't even be upset if they retconned this entire movie.
